Title(s): The Lay of Havelok the Dane
_description: The Lay of Havelok the Dane — 3001 lines in couplets

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Herknet to me gode menWiues maydnes and alle
                    men…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þat ihesu crist his soule bringeBi forn his fader at his
                    endinge

CULAdd4407b.First Lines:
…til sche be comman of oldeþat sche it may here selwe
                    wolde[ ]e and swerde and seyd anon[ ] e Jhesu crist and sen
                    Jon…
CULAdd4407b.Last Lines:
…þat he ne mich speken ne gredenQuider so he wolde hym
                    leden
CULAdd4407b.Note: Three fragments, d, e, f: lines 174-83, 341-64, 537-49.
